markdownRemark.html:
Lighthouse

An open source Google insight or audit tool to help improve the quality of website pages. The tool reports scores for several key factors

  • Overall performance - speed metric on all stages of page load
  • Accessibility - structure and naming of parts of web site.
  • Best practices -
  • Search Engine Optimisation - rules of page design.
  • SEO -

Aside: AMP websites often score well but what is AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) ).

Tasks to improve website: a) Image size b) text and contrast for readability. remove clutter.

Installation

In chrome

  1. Download Google Chrome for Desktop.

How to use

From either chrome, command line or node module. In chrome :

  1. In Google Chrome, go to the URL you want to audit. You can audit any URL on the web.
  2. Open Chrome DevTools.
  3. Click the Audits tab.
